#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string c;
    int i;
    getline(cin,c);
    for(i=0;i<c.length();)
    {
        if((c[i]=='a')||(c[i]=='e')||(c[i]=='i')||(c[i]=='o')||(c[i]=='u'))
        {
            cout<<c[i];
            i+=3;
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<c[i];
            i++;
        }

    }
    return 0;
}
